title: App Permissions
body: ‘QuickScanner’ requests: Camera, Microphone, Contacts, Location, SMS, and Files — to ‘improve protection’.

choices.label: Allow all permissions
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Unneeded access lets apps read messages, listen, or copy contacts. Only allow what is required.

choices.label: Deny unnecessary permissions
choices.feedback: Smart choice. Limit permissions. If an app won’t work without excessive access, don’t use it.
